verses.verse: "At that <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H6458>'Cut<s%> out for yourself <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> like the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H7223>ones,<s%> and <S%H5927>come<s%> up to Me on the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%> for yourself.

'And I will <S%H3789>write<s%> on the <S%H3871>tablets<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that were on the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H7665>shattered,<s%> and you shall <S%H7760>put<s%> them in the <S%H727>ark.<s%>'

"So I <S%H6213>made<s%> an <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H6458>cut<s%> out <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> like the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H7223>ones,<s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> up on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> with the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

"And He <S%H3789>wrote<s%> on the <S%H3871>tablets,<s%> like the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H4385>writing,<s%> the <S%H6235>Ten<s%> <S%H1697>Commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to you on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly;<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to me.

"Then I <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H3871>tablets<s%> in the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I had <S%H6213>made;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> they are, as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me."

(Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> out from <S%H885>Beeroth<s%> Bene-jaakan to <S%H4149>Moserah.<s%> <S%H8033>There<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> he was <S%H6912>buried<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3547>ministered<s%> as <S%H3547>priest<s%> in his <S%H8478>place.<s%>
From <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H5265>set<s%> out to <S%H1412>Gudgodah;<s%> and from <S%H1412>Gudgodah<s%> to <S%H3193>Jotbathah,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5158>brooks<s%> of <S%H4325>water.<s%>

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H914>set<s%> <S%H914>apart<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H8334>serve<s%> Him and to <S%H1288>bless<s%> in His <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3878>Levi<s%> does not <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H2506>portion<s%> or <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with his <S%H251>brothers;<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is his <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him.)

"I, moreover, <S%H5975>stayed<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%> like the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>time,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to me that <S%H6471>time<s%> <S%H1571>also;<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was not <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> you.

"Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H6965>'Arise,<s%> <S%H1980>proceed<s%> on your <S%H4550>journey<s%> <S%H6440>ahead<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that they may <S%H935>go<s%> in and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to their fathers to <S%H1>give<s%> them.'

"And <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> does the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7592>require<s%> from you, but to <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H1870>ways<s%> and <S%H157>love<s%> Him, and to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>soul,<s%>
[and] to <S%H8104>keep<s%> the Lord's <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and His <S%H2708>statutes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H6680>commanding<s%> you <S%H3117>today<s%> for your <S%H9185>good<s%>?

<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> belong <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and the <S%H8064>highest<s%> <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in it.

<S%H7534>"Yet<s%> on your fathers did the <S%H1>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>set<s%> His <S%H2836>affection<s%> to <S%H2836>love<s%> them, and He <S%H157>chose<s%> their <S%H977>descendants<s%> <S%H2233>after<s%> them, [even] you <S%H310>above<s%> <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605>peoples,<s%> as [it is] <S%H5971>this<s%> <S%H2088>day.<s%>
<S%H4135>"Circumcise<s%> then your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and <S%H7185>stiffen<s%> your <S%H6203>neck<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%>

"For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H430>gods<s%> and the <S%H136>Lord<s%> of <S%H113>lords,<s%> the <S%H1419>great,<s%> the <S%H1368>mighty,<s%> and the <S%H3372>awesome<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> does not <S%H5375>show<s%> <S%H5375>partiality,<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H7810>bribe.<s%>

"He <S%H6213>executes<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> for the <S%H3490>orphan<s%> and the <S%H490>widow,<s%> and <S%H157>shows<s%> His <S%H157>love<s%> for the <S%H1616>alien<s%> by <S%H5414>giving<s%> him <S%H3899>food<s%> and <S%H8071>clothing.<s%>
"So <S%H157>show<s%> your <S%H157>love<s%> for the <S%H1616>alien,<s%> for you were <S%H1616>aliens<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
"You shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> you shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> Him and <S%H1692>cling<s%> to Him, and you shall <S%H7650>swear<s%> by His <S%H8034>name.<s%>

"He is your <S%H8416>praise<s%> and He is your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>awesome<s%> <S%H3372>things<s%> for you <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen.<s%>

"Your fathers <S%H1>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H3381>Egypt<s%> <S%H4714>seventy<s%> <S%H7657>persons<s%> [in all,] and <S%H5315>now<s%> the <S%H6258>Lord<s%> your <S%H3068>God<s%> has <S%H430>made<s%> you as <S%H7760>numerous<s%> as the <S%H7230>stars<s%> of <S%H3556>heaven.<s%>
